programme.title: Grizzlies @ Mavericks
programme.desc: The Mavericks wrap up their home-and-home series with the Grizzlies by meeting in the Lone Star State. Dallas claimed a 41-point decision over Memphis to kick off its home schedule for 2022-23. The Grizzlies have dropped three in a row on the road.

programme.title: Suns @ Warriors
programme.sub-title: Phoenix Suns at Golden State Warriors
programme.desc: The Suns look to complete a season-series sweep of the Warriors in a clash of West powers. Phoenix has won all three meetings versus Golden State this season by an average of 17.3 points per game. Stephen Curry (GS) posted 31.7 ppg in those contests.
